attributes.action: Revoke the invitation of a state visit to Donald Trump.
attributes.additional_details:
Among other things, Donald Trump has previously expressed the following problematic views:

- Climate change skepticism
- Anti-migrant/Muslim/Mexican sentiment
- Suppression of critical media organisations
attributes.background:
We respect the people of the United States of America but reject the current President and believe such an individual should not be officially invited on a state visit of the UK.

Mr. Trump represents views which are not held by the majority of UK residents and which go against our principles.
